rubrics.rubric: Joint swelling with stiffness < morning > continued motion
rubrics.modality: Worse on waking; improves after moving for a while

rubrics.rubric: Symmetrical joint involvement with deformities (fingers, wrists)
rubrics.modality: Stiff, twisted, enlarged joints in long-term disease
rubrics.notes: Chronic destructive pathology seen in late RA

rubrics.modality: Rainy or cold seasons aggravate; hot packs relieve

rubrics.rubric: Rheumatic pain changes place or joint frequently (wandering)
rubrics.modality: Pain moves from one joint to another rapidly

rubrics.rubric: Rheumatoid arthritis after suppressed skin eruptions
rubrics.modality: Joint pain started after eczema or skin disease suppressed
rubrics.notes: Common autoimmune trigger in homeopathic understanding

rubrics.rubric: Rheumatism alternating with gastric, urinary or skin complaints
rubrics.modality: Joint pains stop, stomach or bladder issues begin
rubrics.notes: Alternating pathologies key to miasmatic remedy selection

rubrics.rubric: RA with great weakness, worse slightest exertion
rubrics.modality: Tired even after rest; joints feel too weak to move
rubrics.notes: Vitality collapse stage of chronic RA

rubrics.rubric: RA with destructive joint degeneration (bony ankylosis, erosion)
rubrics.modality: Severe deformity, pain even at rest

rubrics.rubric: RA triggered or worsened after grief, insult, humiliation
rubrics.notes: Suppressed emotions as etiology of RA

rubrics.rubric: RA patients: chilly, sweaty, sensitive to weather change
rubrics.modality: Catch cold easily; sweat profuse or offensive
rubrics.notes: Constitutional base common in chronic arthritis cases

rubrics.rubric: RA with anxiety about future, despair of recovery
rubrics.modality: Fear of disability or being a burden

rubrics.rubric: RA with strong inherited miasm: deformities, relapsing attacks, destruction
rubrics.modality: Family history of TB, arthritis, autoimmunity; deformity stage
rubrics.notes: Use as intercurrent when regular remedy stalls

rubrics.rubric: RA after suppression of skin complaints (eczema, psoriasis)
rubrics.modality: Never well since suppressed eruptions; chilly, dirty skin
rubrics.notes: Used to unblock suppressed skin → joint shift

rubrics.rubric: RA with destructive changes + hopelessness + suicidal thoughts
rubrics.modality: Wants to die due to pain, deformity; gloomy and withdrawn
rubrics.notes: Deep miasmatic stage with mental collapse

rubrics.rubric: RA after grief, humiliation, suppressed anger
rubrics.modality: Clear timeline of mind symptom → joint complaint
rubrics.notes: Intercurrent to address root mental block

rubrics.rubric: RA with alternating complaints: skin, stomach, urinary, joints
RA with cold sensitivity, suppressed perspiration
rubrics.modality: Takes cold easily; no eruptions; internalized pathology

rubrics.rubric: RA in tubercular diathesis: alternating heat/chill, changeable symptoms
rubrics.modality: Family TB, emotional intensity, traveling pain, high reactivity
rubrics.notes: Use when case shows restless, alternating modalities

rubrics.rubric: RA with frequent relapse after improvement
rubrics.modality: Gets better with remedy but relapses often or develops new complaint
rubrics.notes: Indicates block in core vital force
